The Protectobots/Chordate:



The Protectobots were interrupted in a light chat by Kaiser's transmission 
and listened to it carefully.

"It's probably a trick or something."

"Well, he had a point about not decimating us from the sky." First Aid 
pointed out.

"Oh," Groove replied.  "I guess your right."

"Five more able bodied Maximals, and a gestalt team at that, could be quite 
beneficial to the Maximal cause." Hot Spot said.  "We'll enter." he concluded 
with light cheers from the Protectobots.

He sent out a transmission from a nearby terminal, and received a response to 
the Protectobots entering the IGL Gestalt League.

---

Chordate got up with a bad hangover, only to listen to the transmission from 
Kaiser halfway through until it replayed again.  Each word hurt his head 
seriously.  He sent a drunken transmission that he would enter the regular 
league and got a response acknowledging his doing so.

"Maybe if I bring five new Maximals here, it'll atone for those that died 
because of my idiocy."
